FuncDef: The display bgp flow routing-table command displays BGP Flow Specification routes.
Examples: Status codes: * - valid, > - best, d - damped, x - best external, a - add path,
h - history,  i - internal, s - suppressed, S - Stale
Origin : i - IGP, e - EGP, ? - incomplete
RPKI validation codes: V - valid, I - invalid, N - not-found
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view information about BGP Flow Specification routes, active or inactive, run the display bgp flow routing-table command.
